text:
Looksery is an American software startup founded in 2013 by Victor Shaburov and Yurii Monastyrshin in Odessa, Ukraine. The company was acquired by Snap Inc. for $150 million. The company developed Looksery mobile application to produce and share facial modification of photos in real time on smartphones.
The company has offices in Ukraine and the United States.
Reception.
Looksery got a lot of media attention. "Vogue" selected Looksery as one of the ten Best Apps of 2014.
TechCrunch named Looksery as "a clever application that lets you change your facial features".
